title: Intercollege Transfer | University of Illinois at Chicago
contents: Skip to the content of this page ,  the main menu , the site search form , the site home page .           Intercollege Transfer     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Intercollege Transfer      Intercollege Transfer   Main Menu    Home    Advising     Eyebrow menu    Undergraduate Catalog    Advising Development    Admissions    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                              Intercollege Transfer       Intercollege Transfer  Intercollege Transfer at UIC             Are you a current UIC student looking to change your major to a major that is in another college at UIC?  Current UIC students who wish to transfer colleges need to apply for an intercollege transfer. Each college has admissions requirements and you will need to ensure that you are aware of the specific application processes for your intended college.  Many of UICâ€™s colleges host info sessions for prospective intercollege transfer students and provide information online:        Unsure which college?  Search for your intended major here!        Colleges        College of Applied Health Sciences  Eligibility varies by program. Visit Student Affairs online to connect to the departments.          College of Architecture, Design, and the Arts  Eligibility varies by department and school. An intercollegiate application is required.          College of Business Administration  Information sessions are offered throughout the semester for students interested in transferring into the college.          College of Education  Sign up for an info session to learn about the transfer process and requirements.          College of Engineering  Online transfer petition form.          College of Liberal Arts and Sciences  Regularly scheduled intercollege transfer information sessions are offered  throughout the fall and spring semesters.          College of Nursing  Prospective student information session schedule.          School of Public Health  There are info sessions for students to learn about the bachelor of arts in public health.          College of Urban Planning and Public Affairs  There are info sessions each semester for students to learn about the college. There's an online petition available.            Application Deadlines     Your intended college may have an application deadline to be admitted for the next term.    Applied Health Sciences  Varies by intended major    Architecture, Design, and the Arts  Varies by intended major    Business Administration  No deadlines; however admissions are granted on a rolling basis,    Education  December 15 for admission for spring semester; May 1 for admission for fall semester;    Engineering  Friday of the first week of fall term and spring term; applications submitted after the Friday of Week 1 will be considered for the subsequent term.    Liberal Arts and Sciences  Deadline for admission for Summer 2019 is Friday, May 10th; applications between May 12th and August 9th will be reviewed for Fall 2019 admission.    Nursing  Fall entry only; applications accepted until January 15th, no exceptions are made.    Public Health  May 15, 2018 for Fall 2018;  November 1 for Spring 2019    Urban Planning and Public Affairs  Applications accepted after participation in an info session;
